properties.entry: SELECT BOOK_CODE, BOOK_TITLE, BOOK_AUTHOR, BOOK_GENRE, BOOK_PUBLISHER FROM BOOKS WHERE BOOK_STATUS = 'TRUE';
UPDATE BORROW_RECORDS SET BOOK_CODE = ?, BOOK_STATUS=false, USER_ID = ?, BORROW_DATE =?, DUE_DATE = ?;
UPDATE BOOKS, BORROW_RECORDS SET BOOK_CODE =?, BOOK_STATUS=true, RETURN_DATE = ?;
UPDATE BORROW_RECODES SET BOOK_CODE = ? , BOOK_STATUS = FALSE, USER_ID = ?, OVER_DUE_BOOKS = TRUE;
